name: UNIV_CHG_LN_DX
description: This table contains diagnosis information for one charge in the Universal Charge Line (UCL) masterfile.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the charge record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Each charge lineï¿½(UCL) can have multiple diagnoses associated with it.  The combination of UCL_ID and LINE make up a unique identifier for this diagnosis.

columns.name: DIAGNOSIS_ID
columns.description: The list of diagnoses associated with this charge.
